items.text: I feel like I have made progress toward being successful in my life
When it comes to achieving things that are important to me, I find that I perform as well as I ideally would like to do
I have found very few hobbies or activities in my life that capture my interest or motivate me to put effort into them
Compared to most people, I am typically unable to get what I want out of life
I feel that I have been able to meet my goals and aspirations in life
I have accomplished a lot of the things I have set out to do
Growing up, would you ever cross the line by doing things that your parents would not tolerate
Not being careful enough has gotten me into trouble at times
I usually obeyed rules and regulations that were established by my parents
Growing up, I often got on my parents' nerves by acting inappropriately
I was always very careful to avoid doing things that might get me into trouble
